movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
movies.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 35 nominations.

movies.title: Miss Congeniality
movies.plot: When the local FBI office receives a letter from a terrorist known only as 'The Citizen', it's quickly determined that he's planning his next act at the Miss America beauty pageant. Because tough-as-nails Gracie Hart is the only female Agent at the office, she's chosen to go undercover as the contestant from New Jersey.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 5 nominations.

events.title: Grace Hart calls it "The perfect date. It’s not too hot, not too cold. All you need is a light jacket."

movies.title: Before Sunrise
movies.plot: On his way to Vienna, American Jesse meets Céline, a student returning to Paris. After long conversations forge a surprising connection between them, Jesse convinces Celine to get off the train with him in Vienna. Since his flight to the U.S. departs the next morning and he has no money for lodging, they wander the city together, taking in the experiences of Vienna and each other.

events.title: Jesse and Celine meet and spend the day together

movies.title: LBJ
movies.plot: The story of U.S. President Lyndon Baines Johnson from his young days in West Texas to the White House.

events.title: Lyndon B. Johnson is inaugurated following the assassination of John F. Kennedy
Lyndon B. Johnson appeals to Congress to pass the Civil Rights Act
Lyndon B. Johnson signs the Civil Rights Act into law

movies.title: Bernie
movies.plot: In small-town Texas, affable and popular mortician Bernie Tiede strikes up a friendship with Marjorie Nugent, a wealthy widow well known for her sour attitude. When she becomes controlling and abusive, Bernie goes to great lengths to remove himself from her grasp.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 wins & 18 nominations.

movies.title: The Polar Express
movies.plot: When a doubting young boy takes an extraordinary train ride to the North Pole, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery that shows him that the wonder of life never fades for those who believe.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 23 nominations.
